#line 1 "in-vals-ret-struct-in.txt" 
float4x4 mvp;

struct v2f {
	float4 pos : POSITION;
	float fog : FOG;
	float2 uv : TEXCOORD0;
	float4 color : COLOR;
};

v2f main (
	float4 pos : POSITION,
	float2 uv : TEXCOORD0,
	float3 normal : NORMAL,
	float4 color : COLOR
)
{
	v2f o;
	o.pos = mul (mvp, pos);
	o.color = color;
	o.color.rgb += normal;
	o.uv = uv;
	return o;
}
